articles.title: Little-known symptom that doctors say could be a sign of cancer - it appears on sheets and pillows every morni - Daily Mail
articles.description: As record-high temperatures spread across the US, night sweats are becoming more common. In rare cases, they could be a sign of certain cancers, such as leukemia.
articles.content:
As record-high temperatures spread across the United States, it can be easy to overlook sweating at night.

articles.title: Scientists discover the 'most mutated Covid variant ever' lurking in a patient in Indonesia - Daily Mail
articles.description: EXCL: The Covid variant, collected from a suspected chronically patient in Indonesia, had collected 113 mutations making it one of the most mutated versions of the virus discovered, experts say.
articles.content:

articles.title: Tiny surgical robots could transform detection and treatment of cancers - University of Leeds
